TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByContentEncodings extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供類型安全方式來設定 類別的 屬性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來指定是否要快取動態壓縮的回應。The property is used to specify whether dynamically compressed responses are cached. 快取動態壓縮的回應表示的壓縮會產生成本只有一次，在第一個要求的資源 （或應用程式重新啟動後） 和快取項目何時到期期間。Caching dynamically compressed responses means that the cost of compression is incurred only one time, during the first request for the resource (or after an application restart) and when the cache item expires. 屬性類別會識別哪一個 ASP.NET 用來唯一識別的回應變化，如果有多個資源的快取回的應的要求標頭參數。The property of the class identifies which request header parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response if there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 當回應取決於一組用戶端的輸入，例如標頭、 參數或內容編碼時，這非常有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers, parameters, or content encodings. 類別不直接相關的 HTTP 快取控制標頭。The class is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers. 不過，它可協助確保用戶端或 proxy 回應因指定的內容編碼方式。However, it helps make sure that a response to a client or a proxy varies by the specified content encoding. 設定內容編碼方式會因快取啟用 ASP.NET 來變更回應`Accept-Encoding`標頭。Setting the cache to vary by content encoding enables ASP.NET to vary the response by the `Accept-Encoding` header. 當處理要求時，`Accept-Encoding`標頭已核取，且第一個可接受編碼為識別，且用來執行下列動作之一：When a request is processed, the `Accept-Encoding` header is checked and the first acceptable encoding is identified and used to take one of the following actions: - 如果比對的編碼方式中也有清單和快取回的應存在時，快取的回應會傳送。If a matching encoding is also found in the list and a cached response exists, the cached response is sent. - 如果比對的編碼方式中也有清單，但快取的回應不存在時，會產生回應，並插入快取。If a matching encoding is also found in the list but a cached response does not exist, a response is generated and inserted into the cache. - 如果在找不到相符的編碼 清單中，快取中搜尋非編碼的回應，也稱為身分識別回應。If a matching encoding is not found in the list, the cache is searched for a non-encoded response, also referred to as the identity response. 如果找到身分識別回應，它會傳送它。If the identity response is found, it is sent. 否則為新的非編碼回應產生並儲存在快取。Otherwise a new non-encoded response is generated and stored in the cache. 如需詳細資訊屬性，請參閱 RFC 2616:超文字傳輸通訊協定，HTTP/1.1，位於[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about the property, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 請參閱節 14 」 標頭欄位定義 」 的完整詳細資料。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. 您可以設定使用指示詞或 Web.config 檔案中的項目加入設定檔的屬性。You can set the property by using the directive or by adding a profile to the element in the Web.config file. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何啟用動態壓縮的回應，可以從輸出快取。The following example shows how to enable a dynamically compressed response that can be served from the output cache. 可接受的編碼會是"gzip"，且設定使用`VaryByContentEncodings`指示詞的屬性。The encoding that is acceptable is "gzip" and is set by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the directive. 如果 Web 伺服器裝載網頁並沒有啟用動態壓縮，輸出快取不會快取的回應指定的內容編碼方式。If the Web server that hosts the page does not have dynamic compression enabled, the output cache will not have a cached response for the specified content encoding. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/VB/default.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cache varies according to the specified content encoding.
